liquidHandlingSpecs.description: Object containing linear equations for translating between uL of liquid and mm of plunger travel. There is one linear equation for aspiration and one for dispense

flowRate.description: Object with a default value and optional dict keyed by api level. If API level is unavailable, default is used.

default.$comment: The default value of the flowrate

$otSharedSchema.description: The path to a valid Opentrons shared schema relative to the shared-data directory, without its extension. For instance, #/pipette/schemas/2/pipetteLiquidPropertiesSchema.json is a reference to this schema.

supportedTips.description: A container of supported tip types

patternProperties.description: Tip specific liquid handling properties for a given pipette. Using the active tip on a pipette, we will look up the pipetting configurations associated with that tip+pipette combo.

defaultAspirateFlowRate.$comment: for lowVolumeDefault only, the flowRate matches the uiMaxFlowRate. This does not change physical behavior and was made for UI purposes

defaultDispenseFlowRate.$comment: for lowVolumeDefault only, the flowRate matches the uiMaxFlowRate. This does not change physical behavior and was made for UI purposes

defaultBlowOutFlowRate.$comment: for lowVolumeDefault only, the flowRate matches the uiMaxFlowRate. This does not change physical behavior and was made for UI purposes

uiMaxFlowRate.$comment: To be used in frontend applications only since it is the limit-to-lowest-max
uiMaxFlowRate.description: An optional number to represent each pipette's supported tip max flow rate for aspirate and dispense. The limit is the lowest max flow rate given all the tip's volumes minus 2% for safety.

defaultTipOverlapDictionary.description: Map of tip overlap values with defaults
defaultTipOverlapDictionary.$comment: Other keys in here should be labware URIs
